Desc.entry: Works with local people to provide leisure and educational activities and classes. Classes include: ESOL, cookery, keep fit, massage, IT, crafts, life drawing, Somali and Arabic languages, women's group, Hatha yoga, samba drumming, Iranian and Iraqi groups (see separate entry). Runs a homework club for primary and secondary school children. The centre can be booked for private functions on Saturdays (see separate entry). Please see website for more details. The centre is a registered charity.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Tues-Thurs 10am-6pm (office times); Mon-Sun 10am-9.30pm (opening times), Mon & Thurs 5-6.45pm (junior and senior homework club). Please see website for more details
